content: what happened with Zulip avatars? mine is missing and I'm seeing a lot of other users with a missing avatar too
@davidtwco do you know by any chance?
I’m not sure. I’ve not read anything about that.
happened to me aswell, but if you actually filter the stream it seems to show the avatars. Also they don't disappear for everyone. For example I could use david's but not yours, Santiago
I think that might've been my fault -- apparently they're tied to whether emails are set to globally readable
AFAIK, Avatars are provided using gravatar (http://en.gravatar.com/). Which is a tracking issue, btw.
